mapper.insert: insert into lcc_cart(user_id,book_idx,quantity,total_price,total_sale_price) select #{user_id},#{book_idx},#{quantity},(b.price * #{quantity}) as total_price,(b.sale_price * #{quantity}) as total_sale_price from lcc_book as b where b.book_idx = #{book_idx}
mapper.select: select A.cart_idx,A.user_id,A.book_idx,A.quantity,A.cart_regdate,A.checked,B.book_name,B.book_img,B.sale_price,B.price,A.total_price,A.total_sale_price from lcc_cart AS A INNER JOIN lcc_book AS B ON A.book_idx = B.book_idx order by cart_idx desc

select A.cart_idx,A.user_id,A.book_idx,A.quantity,A.cart_regdate,A.checked,B.book_name,B.book_img,B.sale_price,B.price,A.total_price,A.total_sale_price from lcc_cart AS A INNER JOIN lcc_book AS B ON A.book_idx = B.book_idx where cart_idx =#{cart_idx} order by cart_idx desc
mapper.update: update lcc_cart as A inner join lcc_book as B ON A.book_idx = B.book_idx set A.quantity=#{quantity}, A.total_price = B.price * ${quantity}, A.total_sale_price = B.sale_price * ${quantity} where cart_idx=#{cart_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from lcc_cart where user_id = #{user_id} and book_idx = #{book_idx}
